item.title: The RL4AA Discord server is up!
item.description: Good News! The RL4AA community is happy to announce its Discord server! If you are interested in discussing reinforcement learning applied to accelerators, please join for announcements (e.g. new publications), forum discussions, an open chat, and meeting rooms. Hope to see you there! https://discord.gg/QtBMqsjWH2
